body: In dim light, you resemble little more than a shadow.
name: Shadowy Dash
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Wayangs/New Racial Rules/Wayang Feats/Shadowy Dash

sections.body: Whenever you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can move at full speed using Stealth without taking the normal –5 penalty for doing so.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: When moving at more than half your speed and up to your normal speed, you take a –5 penalty on Stealth checks.
sections.name: Normal
